data.eml:eml: The first record of genus Gryllomorpha Fieber in Romania (Orthoptera: Gryllidae: Gryllomorphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Iorgu, Ștefan, Chobanov, Dragan, Skolka, Marius, Zaharia, Răzvan, Iorgu, Elena Iulia (2019): The first record of genus Gryllomorpha Fieber in Romania (Orthoptera: Gryllidae: Gryllomorphinae). Zootaxa 4543 (4): 581-583, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4543.4.5
